generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato|Schoolbell");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Crimson+Text");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato");*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{font-family:Lato,Gill Sans,Gill Sans MT,Calibri,Trebuchet MS,sans-serif;font-weight:400;font-size:16px;line-height:1.7;color:#777;padding:30px}.container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(12,1fr)}.card-header-title{font-size:2em;font-weight:700;font-family:Crimson Text;display:inline}.header{height:95vh;min-width:580px;background-image:linear-gradient(to right bottom,rgba(45,180,210,.8),rgba(10,50,55,.8)),url(ec781c90558910beecdfddac3b760333.jpg);clip-path:polygon(0 0,100% 0,100% 75vh,0 100%);background-size:cover;background-position:top;position:relative;grid-column:1/-1}.logo-box{position:absolute;top:20px;left:20px}.logo{height:75px}.text-box{position:absolute;top:40%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.heading-primary{color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;backface-visibility:hidden}.heading-primary-main{font-size:1.5em;display:block;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:5px;animation:moveInLeft 1s ease-in-out}.heading-primary-sub{font-size:1em;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:10px;display:block;animation:moveInRight 1s ease-in-out}@keyframes moveInLeft{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(-100px)}80%{transform:translateX(10px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes moveInRight{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(100px)}80%{transform:translateX(-10px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}a{color:inherit}a:hover{color:#30b6d1}.main{grid-column:3/-1}.main-section{margin-bottom:1em;margin-left:1em;padding:1em;border:1px solid #30b6d1}.card-header-icon{color:#30b6d1}.menu{background-color:#30b6d1;grid-column:1/3;padding:1em}.menu li{border-bottom:1px solid #fff;margin-bottom:1em}.menu a{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}.menu a:hover{color:#196e82}ul{list-style:none}.fixed{position:fixed;top:0;height:100%}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.main,.menu{grid-column:1/-1}}
